Chimpanzee Web Hosting and Servers


A Chimpanzee VPS is completely customizable and can be upgraded any time as your site grows. Full root access allows you total control, as well as the ability to install advanced software and completely customize your hosting environment. It truly is dedicated functionality without the expense.


VPS 1

Intel Xeon
2 Core CPU-Power
4 GB RAM (DDR3)
40GB SSD storage
Unmetered bandwidth
Connected at 100 Mbit
DDoS Protection Included
Available both on Linux and Windows
19.99€ MONTHLY
